function-usage-examples.testenviron: In order to try out the examples, start a command shell and move to folder $FOXPATH/example-data/oxygen-samples.

example.description: Get a tree view of all .dita files with a "concept" root element.
As before, but annotate the file elements with an @ti annotation providing the title.
Add a second annotation, "terms", providing all terms contained. Create for each term a distinct child element "term".
For those files starting with "c_mv_" add a third annotation "enames" listing all element names used in the document. Create for each element name a distinct child element "ename".
example.code: fox ".//*.dita[\concept] => ftree-view('@ti=\*\title', 'terms/term?=\\term[text()] => distinct-values() => sort()', 'c_mv_* enames/ename=\\*\name() => distinct-values() => sort()')"

function-usage-examples.seealso: For more examples of how to define file properties, look at the examples for function ftree().
